title: RetroBot is now public!
content:
RetroBot is now public!

May 1, 2022

RetroBot can now be added to any Discord server! There are free and paid features.

    Free: Search Yu-Gi-Oh! cards and check if decks are legal for all formats. No cost.
    Affiliate: Host FormatLibrary.com sanctioned ranked play OR an internal ladder for one (1) format. $15 per server.
    Partner: Host tournaments integrated with your Google Drive (uploads .YDK files and metagame info) and Challonge accounts. $40 set up fee, plus a $20 per year subscription to cover maintenance and server costs.
    Click here to invite RetroBot to your Discord server!
author: Jazz
